posts.raw_content:
The man is not perfect and has some views we all probably disagree with here. But he is a Great man. A truly good person. A brave warrior for western culture. He has helped MAGA in immeasurable ways. 

This guy almost single handedly took the “moderate-left” and moved it to the moderate-right. He gave intellectual legitimacy to the right, at a time when we desperately needed it, having a so-called “reality tv star” as our leader who sometimes speaks crudely. In a similar way that Vance does today, in 2016 Peterson was able to unpack Trumpism and explain how it’s not crazy at all. He absolutely dismantled and humiliated the tranny cult at a time when it was gaining universal acceptance in academia and “science.” He also deserves a ton of credit for intellectualizing Christian thought at a time when Christians were being successfully attacked for being “superstitious rubes” by the left (Obama). 

Jordan Peterson is arguably the most intelligent person on the entire “right wing” — even if he is a bit moderate. If you’ve written him off as pretentious, you are a fool. Get a coffee (you’ll need it to keep up with him), read his books or watch his lectures. He’s a genuine genius. He will change your life for the better and enlighten you to things you never would have understood without him. Scalia and Thomas Sowell have nothing on JP. JP is the most well spoken person I’ve ever heard, it just takes a while to grasp what he’s saying beyond a superficial level. It’s easy to dismiss him as pretentious, but he’s the polar opposite. He is not expressing simple ideas in complex ways; he is is expressing complex ideas in the simplest way possible

Losing Kirk and Peterson in one month would be unfathomably terrible for our country. These two are worth more than 90% of the influencers on our side, combined. They are red pill factories — not a grifter bone in their body. Real geniuses and Good People who fight HARD for Christians. I cannot stress this last point enough. Jordan Peterson is a GOOD person; he is the epitome of one. He has sacrificed so much for people like us. The fact that he’s still going, after his nightmarish hell, created by his health issues, and the health issues of his family, is nothing short of miraculous. Not even Trump can match this man’s fortitude and persistence. 

His family genuinely believes they are being *spiritually* attacked. They have asked for our prayers. PRAY FOR PETERSON. He needs good people to pray for him. I am a worthless piece of shit and God may not care what I ask Him for. I am honestly begging you to pray for JP.
posts.author: ModsAreCucked
posts.title: Pray for Jordan Peterson

posts.title: 16 wounded in mass gang shooting tied to Alabama Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCU) football game.

link_metadata.description: At least two people are dead, and a dozen others, including a child, are injured, after a ‘mass shooting event’ in Montgomery, Ala., on Saturday, Oct. 4. The incident took place during a busy time in the city, with a fair and other attractions set up to coincide with a football game between Tuskegee University and Morehouse College.
link_metadata.title: At Least 2 Dead, Multiple Others, Including a Child, Injured in ‘Mass Shooting' After College Football Game and Fair in Alabama
